## DatabaseTable.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `DatabaseTable` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(connection: DatabaseConnection, table: string, columns?: string | string[]);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  connection | [DatabaseConnection](./forms42core.databaseconnection.md) | : OpenRestDB connection to a database |
